channel.title: Bloodhound on AlrikRr's Blog

item.title: Forest
item.description: Re-Post from October 2021, 13rd Enumeration NMAP sudo nmap -v -sS -A -Pn 10.10.10.161 Simple NMAP scan to check the most commun ports and grab banner or version number. As we can see, there are a lot of Windows server services as Kerberos, DNS LDAP, … The machine is part of the HTB.local network. Bonus : Windows Server 2016 Standard 14393 (Windows Server 2016 Standard 6.3) LDAPSearch Since there is an LDAP port, we can try if there is a way to gather information on the LDAP server using ldapsearch with anonymous account.
